transArray.content: The price of the room booked from Ctrip is very favorable, and the room environment is also very good. Each room also comes with free coffee bags and tea bags. The restaurant on the first floor is quite spacious, and the breakfast is also delicious, including fried fish-flavored shredded pork. There are hand-shredded cabbage! very good! ! The check-in experience is great! !
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing me. You are not a dim star, but the entire galaxy that encompasses the bright moon. I love you, little man.
